citations.narrative:
There are accumulations of brown debris and staining around the PVC drainpipe surrounding the automatic water valves.
These accumulatios around the water valves can expose the guinea pigs to potential disease infections with bacteria,
fungi, and parasites. Water receptacles such as automatic water vales and drainage pipes must be cleaned and sanitized
whenever dirty and at least once every two weeks. Licensee must establish and maintain a program to keep the water
valves sanitized at least once every two weeks, and water receptacles must be sanitized whenever they appear dirty.
Correct by January 29, 2025.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representative.
